name: Ten monkey challenge
description:
From the creator of great logic games such as Number 7, Swap Tycoon and more comes with new innovative puzzle.

Ten Monkey Challenge it is a relaxing logic puzzle game with a dice!!

Features:
► Pixel art graphics
► Innovative gameplay
► High Quality music and sound effects
► 100 percent fun
► Leaderboard and achievements supported
► Automatically save game data

How to play:
Ten Monkey Challenge is a dice game where you must combine sum 10 in horizontal or vertical line! When you do it all dice created sum will be erased!

Get this game if you like pixel arts, happy music, monkeys and a lot of great puzzle game!

Thank you for playing!
